252102.fix: Wait for the development to finish.

when nc.description: [DC24 DEV] When is the Nintendo channel releasing?

117404.fix: If you're getting this on the Nintendo Channel, wait until the patcher releases.

199-9999.fix: This usually happens when launching custom WUPs. Enable Mocha CFW or install CBHC and try again.

103-9999.description: [Wii U] A communication error has occured
103-9999.fix: Make sure there is no network interference (proxying) occuring.

109139.fix: Go to Wii Settings > Internet Settings, and enable it.

231000.description: [WC24] Data could not be sent. Check your internet settings.
231000.fix: If you're getting this on the Everybody Votes Channel, try restarting or if you get it again, repatch.

FORE000006.fix: Try unscrewing your battery cover on your Wii and put it back in a few hours later.

NEWS0000006.fix: This means there too many news articles the Wii can support. Try again later.

239001.fix: Try repatching IOS 31, to see if that fixes the issue.

295500.fix: This usually happens if you're not connected to internet. Connect to the internet and try again.

102032.fix: Try repatching to see if that fixes the issue.

20100.description: [WC24] Unable to connect to the internet
20100.fix: First try restarting your Wii, then try reconfiguring your connection.

51331.fix: Try reconfiguring your WLAN settings on both your router and on the Wii.

201301.fix: Unknown Error Related to the Wii Shop Channel. Try rebooting to see if that helps.

20110.fix: Try repatching your ISO for the service of your choice.

204019.fix: The Wii Shop Channel is currently under heavy load. Please try again later.

107006.fix: The mail attachment is too large to load.

85010.fix: The matchmaking server is currently down. Please try again later.

354606.fix: There are currently no plans for DC24 to revive this service. Please hit the F for Wii no Ma.

52430.fix: There is an issue with your proxy. Please check your proxy settings.

105409.fix: There is currently no known fix. However, try reconfiguring your DNS settings.
